text: WJJW (91.1 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a Variety format. Licensed to North Adams, Massachusetts, United States, the station serves the Northern Berkshire County area. The station is owned by the Massachusetts College of Liberal Arts. The callsign WJJW had previously been assigned to a Wyandotte, Michigan radio station broadcasting at 103.1 MHz. The station operated from September 11, 1947 to May 1, 1951. Category:Radio stations in the United States
title: WJJW
